page.title: 19Playground games
page.content: Boys and girls play{chasing}games together.Boys play football to develop their skills.They enjoy playing chasing games which they have invented themselves.Sometimes they copy computer games or use markings on the playground for safe places where no-one can catch them.They use{rhymes like this to decide who is the catcher. "Racing car number nine, Losing petrol all the time, How many gallons did they lose? One,two,three...OUT" Girls also play chasing games.They enjoy making their own rules.They call the catcher names like Master,Monster,Cat or Hunter.The others are Dog,Girl,Baby or Animal.They use rhymes too.
